system.requirements:
Tier 3; WS 30, Weapon Training (any Melee)
Aptitudes: Weapon Skill, Finesse, Khorne
system.effect: Once per Round, may reroll a missed attack with a bladed weapon, (sword, chainaxe, power sword, etc)

description.value: Once per Round, may reroll a missed attack with a bladed weapon, (sword, chainaxe, power sword, etc)
